flow.descriptionCdata:
3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.0331385f-b678-40e9-a8ca-ce5eb63efa29.prompt=User Identifier 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.038d7f92-c2bd-480b-aa16-0b1837ec3458.prompt=User Identifier 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.0730e991-429f-4ec6-9468-7bf814c1ce80.prompt=Component ID 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.0c84febe-14da-426e-9bba-7c6408c98fd2.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.0f48dc98-4571-4c32-a1de-d7140e8ba452.prompt=Enter a value for trustKeystore 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.183214ec-50e7-41b7-9c8c-a012ff7aad43.prompt=Resource Provider ID 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.22da427d-e1f9-4757-b536-13f7d1fab683.prompt=Enter a value for proxy 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.23cfd2b0-b021-424c-a1d8-32332508b97c.prompt=Organization ID 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.26e9ab6d-9762-4909-b18e-7f4091bb6700.prompt=Enter a value for kerberosConfFile 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.292bfe73-8d26-4e20-98ee-0eb797de5472.prompt=Enter a value for authType 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.3329d6ec-de68-4624-9c18-c5fab0790ea1.prompt=User Identifier 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.33f57ea8-5599-4343-93b4-fc70c777c1c3.description=
This workflow returns the list of Artifact’s Properties and values.

Inputs-
artifactId  –  Artifact id
userIdentifier  - User Identifier id
propertyNames – List of property names separated by pipe |
If user provides this inputs, flow will return the values for given property names only. Otherwise flow will return all properties and values for the given artifact.
authType - The authentication type that this operation uses when trying to execute the request on the target server.
Valid values\: basic, form, digest, ntlm, kerberos, anonymous (no authentication).
Default value\: anonymous - authentication not used when executing the request.
kerberosConfFile - The path to the Kerberos configuration file. If this input is empty the kdc (Key Distribution Center) and realm will get their values from the full domain name which is obtained from the url of the web server.
timeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for a connection to be established. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A timeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
socketTimeout - The number of milliseconds to wait for the data to be retrieved. This input should be assigned a value greater than or equal to zero. A socketTimeout value of zero is an infinite timeout.
Default value\: 0.
useCookies - If true, enables cookie tracking. Cookies will be stored between consecutive calls. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true.
followRedirects - If true, the GET command automatically follows redirects. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: true
proxy - A proxy to use when accessing the web site.
proxyPort - The port on the proxy to connect to.
proxyUsername - The username to use when connecting to the proxy.
proxyPassword - The password to use when connecting to the proxy.
encodeURL - If true, automatically encodes the URL. This is a boolean input. If a non-boolean value is specified, it will take the default value.
Default value\: false.
userAgent - The value that should be used if the HTTP header USER_AGENT has to be overridden.
trustAllRoots - If true, enables weak security over SSL. A SSL certificate is trusted even if no trusted CA issued it.
Default value\: true
keystore - URL of the keystore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS client authentication is not to be used.
keystorePassword - Password to unlock the keystore.
trustKeystore - URL of the truststore file or local path to it (e.g. %JAVA_HOME%/jre/lib/security/cacerts). It may be empty if HTTPS server authentication is not to be used.
trustPassword - Password to unlock the truststore.

Outputs-
propertyNameValuesList – List of property Names and values
E.g. property 1;value1,value2|property 2;value3|property 3;value3,value4|........
3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.35c7ce9b-155d-46e3-bcfb-3c92ae49f062.prompt=User Identifier 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.39daa408-9cba-4d92-a7c9-e80651a3a495.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.429b34fc-8c09-4796-bc20-839c8beb100f.prompt=User Identifier 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.453cc38a-caf0-4a54-ad35-2cac877f00a5.prompt=Component ID 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.4e0461ec-3e57-4dba-8413-b7c07a7858e3.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.5170e073-2559-4c7c-a056-86eb4e0e6273.prompt=User Identifier 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.5f759d0d-11c8-48df-b69c-11ddbee0272d.prompt=Artifact ID 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.6611cf0b-7009-4453-8cbb-f3f32c28e90c.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.7130269b-e3cb-4588-b2de-2c30cabf5358.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
string1 - The first string.
string2 - The second string.
ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal
3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.723d7234-7c0c-4a28-8c45-6dc8b7db894c.prompt=Enter a value for trustPassword 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.745eea97-a61b-45fa-b0b8-54d2f3af6712.prompt=Enter a value for trustAllRoots 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.7470e7b4-999a-4aa7-b675-fa6fb7c13c79.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPassword 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.7ba693bd-1f55-46dd-a248-575699ec07c9.prompt=User Identifier 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.88ed7904-5c45-4dcc-aaef-686fb3c56cd6.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
string1 - The first string.
string2 - The second string.
ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal
3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.8913b2aa-8f69-4c4c-8852-576583d4eeba.prompt=Enter a value for keystorePassword 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.8f4cdfad-9c2b-4125-939b-31707a39da54.prompt=Component ID 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.91208d12-7c0b-4d1d-aece-c1d04938a4d6.prompt=Enter a value for socketTimeout 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.92a7bc46-1594-4dd5-9767-80175bd315d2.prompt=Enter a value for proxyPort 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.9693ff26-c63f-489f-9bb8-e6a435d05cef.description=This workflow adds/ updates the component properties to Instance using Artifact APIs. onlyUpdate\: yes/no yes - To update values of existing properties no - To add and/or update properties keyValuePairs\: If you want to Add/update new properties\: property1 PUBLIC INTEGER 5 property2 PUBLIC STRING abc xyz If you want to only update the values of existing properties\: property1 5 property2 abc xyz 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.a4924ff6-c588-44ab-845f-b597298be7a2.prompt=Artifact ID 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.a7e72ae4-6660-4e68-9350-1143bd7285aa.prompt=Enter a value for userAgent 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.aa114910-d13e-4be5-aa53-90cdf1c02275.prompt=User Identifier 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.b42f8e72-7750-4b34-bae6-55997c920cbe.prompt=Enter a value for keystore 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.b631bbcc-2f46-432e-bb9f-250eeef5e3f7.prompt=Process Instance ID 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.b892ac68-1615-4a6b-9f5e-d8450e96492b.description=
Check to see if the value stored in a specified flow variable, denoted by key, is null.

Inputs\:
keyName - The key to check, i.e. the name of the flow variable.

Returns\: 
The value in the specified key, i.e. flow variable.

Responses\:
isNull - If the key is a null pointer, i.e. the flow variable doesn't have an assigned value.
notNull - If some value is stored in the key, i.e the flow variable has a value assigned.
3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.c34ac518-21b1-4669-bfa4-019453dd1cbd.prompt=User Identifier ID 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.c5d51b3c-4a43-460e-adfc-73910f29487b.prompt=User Identifier 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.ca3c9096-309e-43af-a439-ed943b30d56e.description=This workflow returns the component properties and values using Artifact APIs. result\: propertyNameValuesList\: pipe separated list of property name and values ( where each property name and values would be ; seprated and multiple values would be , seprated) e.g. - property 1; value1,value2|property 2; value3|property 3; value3,value4|........ 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.ce881ff5-71d3-4074-9c98-d72ffcdcd8b4.prompt=Enter a value for encodeURL 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.cf62e0a8-503f-4fc9-af6d-5b7674fbe579.prompt=Process Instance ID 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.d1a75541-d09f-4fc1-9262-53db41d942bd.prompt=Process Instance ID 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.d340508b-9122-4a68-8e88-cf56380cab73.prompt=User Identifier 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.ddea38ac-1a1a-4804-bbde-9780ffe21447.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.description=
This workflow performs Simple Compute Linux  Monitor Deploy operation on the server identified by CSA Service Component.

Inputs\:

CSA_CONTEXT_ID 	\: CSA Context Id
CSA_PROCESS_ID 	\: CSA Process Instance Id
SVC_COMPONENT_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Service component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:SVC_COMPONENT_ID]
RSC_PROVIDER_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Provider Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\:RSC_PROVIDER_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL \: This token will resolve to the subscriber’s email address. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_EMAIL]
RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Subscription Id that was created from the Resource Offering at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE 	\: This token will resolve to the Service component type. Eg\: Server.. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_COMPONENT_TYPE]
RSC_POOL_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource pool Id that was selected at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_POOL_ID]
SVC_INSTANCE_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Service Instance Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_INSTANCE_ID]
SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Subscription Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: SVC_SUBSCRIPTION_ID]
PRN_COMPONENT_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the parent Component’s Service Component Id. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: PRN_COMPONENT_ID]
REQ_ORG_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_ORG_ID]
REQ_USER_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the User Id associated with the service request. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: REQ_USER_ID]
USR_ORG_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Organization Id associated with the subscriber. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: USR_ORG_ID]
RSC_BINDING_ID 	\: This token will resolve to the Resource Binding Id that was created at the Subscription time. Default value for this token is [TOKEN\: RSC_BINDING_ID]

These tokens with the default values are resolved by CSA when the flow is invoked.

Responses\:
success 		\: Workflow completed successfully.
failure 		\: Something went wrong.
3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.e0b43092-0d5d-4dc4-8411-415048c5e6fc.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
string1 - The first string.
string2 - The second string.
ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal
3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.e5443bcb-a856-4f31-95f1-d47740ac7b36.prompt=Enter a value for timeout 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.ee318f0c-6756-4170-90ef-0b4bfadbeada.prompt=Enter a value for useCookies 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.f0188181-d905-46f1-a9d2-c4b2d7d002e3.description=
Adds a flow variable into the local context (available to itself and child flows only)

Input Parameters\:
keyName - the name of the flow variable to use
myValue - the value to assign the flow variable

Responses\:
success - assigned the flow variable

Scriptlet Example\:
[$scriptletContext putGlobal\: $keyName, $myValue];
3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.f364c7b9-dddb-4d01-b82d-cb71be39181e.prompt=Process Instance ID 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.f5bca57c-ec8c-4e5a-8599-d648e9ad0622.prompt=Enter a value for followRedirects 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.f85443b3-5083-467c-922b-e2d65c2bd8cf.description=
This workflow retrieves all the child components from the list of component ids.

Inputs\:

artifactIds		- List of component ids each separated by "," for which the child components will be retrieved
userIdentifier	- User Identifier to pass to the wrapper flow to retrieve the child components

Responses\:
success - Workflow completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.
3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.fe1c69e1-950c-4279-9c1c-bbdff24da765.description=This workflow updates the Process Instance State using PEM API. Inputs\: _PROCESS_INSTANCE_ID - Process Instance Id _processInstanceState - Process Instance State (Use value from selection list CSA-ProcessInstance-State) Result\: _processInstanceState -Updated Process Instance State 3d98324f-b01e-4508-a32d-95a107321eb1.fee4a9cf-bbce-47d0-93fa-fb9ba256605f.prompt=Enter a value for proxyUsername
flow.name: Simple Compute Linux Monitor - Deploy
